sentences.en: A family's outing ended in tragedy when their boat capsized.
sentences.cn: 一家人出游,结果船翻了,造成悲剧.

sentences.en: Even if It'should rain tomorrow, they will go for an outing.
sentences.cn: 纵使明天下雨, 他们也要去游览.

sentences.en: I think we should postpone the outing.
sentences.cn: 我认为我们应该推迟这次郊游.

sentences.en: I'll go on an outing with some friends this weekend.
sentences.cn: 我这周末要与朋友去郊游.

sentences.en: I'll go on an outing with some friends.
In view of the weather, we will cancel the outing.
sentences.cn: 因天气关系, 我们要取消此次郊游.

sentences.en: One evening, she made a rare outing to the local discotheque.
sentences.cn: 她有天晚上破天荒地去了一次当地的迪斯科舞厅。

sentences.en: One evening, she made a rare outing to the local night club.
sentences.cn: 一天晚上，她难得地去了一趟当地的夜总会。

sentences.en: Playing against Zebre in England's first outing, he suffered a whiplash injury to his neck.
sentences.cn: 在英格兰队首次对阵热布里的比赛中，他颈部受了挥鞭伤。

sentences.en: The outing will do me good.
sentences.cn: 这次远足对我会有所助益。

sentences.en: We can't go without you for this outing.
We often go for an outing in the country on fine days in spring and autumn.
We shall go for an outing next Sunday.
We went for an outing that included a picnic and a volleyball game.
sentences.cn: 我们出去做了一次包括野餐和排球比赛的远足.

sentences.en: We went for an outing to the sea on Sunday.
sentences.cn: 星期天我们到海边去玩了.

sentences.en: We went on an outing to London.

words.tran_cn: 外面的，外部的；远离中心的
最远的；最外面的；最高头的
向外的；外面的；公开的；外服的；肉体的
出现；在外；出局；出声地；不流行地
向外（等于outwards）；在外；显而易见地

trans.tran_cn: 远足，参赛，体育比赛，（违背同性恋者本人意愿）对（其）身份的公开挑明
trans.tran_en: a short trip that a group of people take for pleasure
